text: I placed an order at 3:10 for delivery of 2 pizzas and a two liter of Pepsi. The order did not arrive until 4:25. This is completely unacceptable. Three o'clock is the slowest hour of the day on a Sunday. The last time I ordered from here …More

text: They brought us the completely wrong pizza... They said they would give us a credit.... Then, when we ordered our next pizza we asked about the credit. They kid talked to the manager and gave us the credit but said "the manager wanted me to tell you that this is the last time they can do that for us"... I was speechless...
